ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write access to this field pushes data to Transmit FIFO

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Read access to this field pops data from Receive FIFO

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: target_addr_l_reg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 7-bit of the target address

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: target_addr_h_reg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: For 10-bit address mode only. Higher 3-bit target address

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_reset
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Resets the transmit FIFO logic, effectively flushing the contents

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nack_data
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies ACK/NACK response on I2C data phase.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nack_addr
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies ACK/NACK response on I2C address phase.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: reset
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Resets I2C Target IP Core for 1 clock cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: clk_stretch_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables clock stretching on the ACK bit.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: addr_10bit_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables the reception of 10-bit I2C address.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: byte_cnt
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of data bytes for the generating transfer complete interrupt

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the number of bytes transferred in I2C interface is equal to TGT_BYTE_CNT.byte_cnt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_det_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when STOP condition is detected after an ACK/NACK bit.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when Transmit FIFO changes from not full state to full state.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the amount of data words in Transmit FIFO changes from 'TX FIFO Almost Empty Flag' – 1 to 'TX FIFO Almost Empty Flag'.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the last data in Transmit FIFO is popped-out, causing the FIFO to become empty.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when RX FIFO full status changes from not full to full state.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the amount of data words in Receive FIFO changes from 'RX FIFO Almost Full Flag' – 1 to 'RX FIFO Almost Full Flag'.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when Receive FIFO is empty and receives a data word from I2C interface.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Transfer Complete Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_det_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DInterrupt enable bit corresponded to STOP Condition Detected Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Ready Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transfer Complete Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_det_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to STOP Condition Detected Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Ready Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_addr_det_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: A new transaction has started and the I2C address has been received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_det_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts after detecting a START condition or a repeated START condition.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_err_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts after detecting a STOP condition when it is not expected.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_err_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts after detecting a START condition when it is not expected.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_addr_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponding to the Received I2C Address Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_det_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to START Condition Detected Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_err_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to STOP Condition Error Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_err_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enable bit corresponded to START Condition Error Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_addr_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponding to the Received I2C Address Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_det_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to START Condition Detected Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: stop_err_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to STOP Condition Error Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start_err_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to START Condition Error Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the full condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the almost empty condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the empty condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the full condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the almost full condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_empty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the empty condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_addr_1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: With a 7-bit address, contains the recently received address. With a 10-bit address, the last 2 bits contain the two most significant bits of the 10-bit address.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_rnw
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Received I2C Read or Write Bit
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Read or write bit of the most recently received I2C transaction.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_addr_2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: With a the 10-bit address, this field contains the 8 least significant bits of the received address.
